meta.title: From CORN to HOLE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: Corn hole, also called Sack Toss or simply Bags, is a block party staple. Players throw bean bags (historically filled with dried corn kernels, hence the name) at boards, earning one point for landing on the board and three points for getting it in the hole. A similar game called Parlor Quoits received a patent in 1883, but used a square hole rather than a circular one.

ladder.clue: Add a letter to the start of <> to get a forest sight
Remove a letter in <> to get an agreement
Drop the first letter of <> and anagram to get an ideal
Insert a letter into <> to describe a kind of train?
Change one letter in <> to get an opening
